attributes.action: FINE TAKEAWAY OUTLETS WHOSE RUBBISH IS LEFT THROWN ACROSS THE LAND
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: THESE OUTLETS ACCROSS THE COUNTRY WASH THEIR HANDS OF THE PACKERGING ONCE THEY HAVE SOLD THE FOOD.IT ENDS UP THROWN ALL OVER THE PLACE(MAINLY BY UNCARING TEENAGERS AND ADULTS ALIKE WHICH NOT ONLY LOOKS UNSIGHTLY BUT ALSO BREEDS RATS AND ENCOURAGES FOXES TO BECOME MORE URBAN,AS THEY COME AFTER THE SCRAPS.THERE SHOULD BE HEFTY FINES FOR THE PEOPLE WHO THROW IT AND THE SAME TO THE OUTLETS.AS THE FOOD WOULD THEN GET MORE EXPENSIVE FOR THESE FOOLS THEY MAY START TO THINK ABOUT THEIR ACTIONS

rejection.details: Please rewrite using upper and lower case.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
